com.dougnoel.sentinel.pages

Class Page

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dougnoel.sentinel.pages.Page

  • public class Page
extends Object
    Page class to contain a URL and the elements on the page.

    TO DO:

    • Turn this into an abstract class.
    • Create a PageFactory
    • Abstract out the driver creation to allow multiple drivers to be created at once

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Page()
      Initializes a WebDriver object for operating on page elements, and sets the base URL for the page.

      • Page

        public Page()

    • Method Detail

      • setImplicitWait

        public Page setImplicitWait(long timeInSeconds)
        Sets an implicit wait time for the page before giving up on finding an element.

        Caution: This does not work well in conjunction with the selenium explicit wait functionality.

        Parameters:
        timeInSeconds - long
        Returns:
        Page - Returns a page object for chaining.

      • maximizeWindow

        public Page maximizeWindow()
        Maximizes the browser window. Stores the current window size and position so you can return to the existing settings.
        Returns:
        Page - Returns a page object for chaining.

      • undoWindowSizing

        public Page undoWindowSizing()
        Undoes the previous window sizing and position operation.
        Returns:
        Page - Returns a page object for chaining.

      • restoreOriginalWindowSize

        public Page restoreOriginalWindowSize()
        Restores the browser window size and location to the values set when the page was first defined.
        Returns:
        Page - Returns a page object for chaining.

      • getPageTitle

        public String getPageTitle()
        Returns the title of the current web page we are on. Useful for debugging and assertions.
        Returns:
        String

        public String getCurrentUrl()
        Returns the URL of the current web page we are on. Useful for debugging and assertions.
        Returns:
